thread.title: Sachin Tendulkar lends his voice for Swachh Bharat Abhiyan song
thread.title_full: Sachin Tendulkar lends his voice for Swachh Bharat Abhiyan song - The Times of India

author: V Lakshmi
title: Sachin Tendulkar lends his voice for Swachh Bharat Abhiyan song
text:
Music composer Shankar Mahadevan and his son Siddharth have joined hands with cricket maestro Sachin Tendulkar for a song that focuses on the government's Swachh Bharat Abhiyan.
READ: Government ropes in Sachin Tendulkar for 'Swachh Bharat' anthem
Siddharth says, "The number has been composed by Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy, and my cousin Soumil Shringarpure and I have produced it. Sachin has lent his voice for the song; he has recited a poem and we are happy he agreed to be a part of this project. " He adds, "Multiple singers have recorded this song â€” Shreya Ghoshal, Udit Narayan , Alka Yagnik , Shaan , Kailash Kher , Babul Supriyo and Akriti Kakar among others. Dad and I have also sung a few lines."
